name: Victor Bonssrah
review: The word is being preached day in and day out.The word of God is not watered down.Ww preach the Bible.

name: Asenath Asuta
review: I love my church. Everyone in the church are very loving. The church elders very welcoming. The pastor preaches very good and he is very nice with a happy face all the time. Once you enter the building you feel the love.

name: Elaine Thurmond
review: Ouch Church always glad and happy spiritually to go

name: dian kelly
review: Awesomely nice people. If lived closer would attend.
